name: com.bayturan.protocasual
description:
Game Factory Framework for casual mobile games.

▪ Genre-agnostic architecture (HyperCasual, Puzzle, Racing, Endless, Hybrid)
▪ GameMode-driven design with plug-in mechanics
▪ ScriptableObject-based configuration
▪ Built-in managers: Game, UI, Input, Audio, Economy, Inventory, Equipment, Level, Save
▪ Monetization-ready (Ads, IAP interfaces)
▪ Single scene architecture
▪ Clone-and-ship ready

samples.description: Sample game modes, SDK integrations, bots, and content showing how to use the framework.
